nodes.text: Dejan was a male Major of the Galactic Republic living during the Cold War. He was stationed on Taris during 3643 BBY.

Major Dejan was supposed to appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic mission "The Metal Swarm," which was cut from the game. However, he is still mentioned during the heroic mission "Total Elimination." His character model in the game files shows Dejan to be a male Togruta.
